Song.title: Soli Deo Gloria
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge Â© 2002 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: E | Bm | D2 | G2 :||]
Verse 1: We res[E2]olve to know nothing else, but [A2]Jesus Christ [D2]Jesus Christ, and Him [A2]crucified We res[E2]olve to know nothing else, but [A2]Jesus Christ The [D2]Lamb of God, and our [A2]sacrifice To [B]come to [B/F#]God by [E/G#]grace al[A]one Through [E/G#]faith al[A]one in His [B]blood,{,}[B/A] [ ]spilled for [| B/G# B/F# |]us
Chorus: Singing [E]soli Deo [B]gloria To [F#m]God alone be glory To [D2]God alone be glory Singing [E]soli Deo [Bm]gloria To [A2]God alone be glory To [D2]God alone be glory [D2] [ ]In Jesus Christ [(to intro)]
Verse 2: We res[E2]olve to live for nothing else, but [A2]Jesus Christ To [D2]know the One who [A2]is our life We res[E2]olve to live by nothing but{,} Your [A2]Word alone Your [D2]strength alone, for Your [A2]will alone To [B]make our [B/F#]goal to please [E/G#]You al[A]one Worship [E/G#]You al[A]one, our [B]God [B/A] [ ]and our [B/G# B/F#]King
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 we resolve to know nothing else but jesus christ jesus christ and him crucified we resolve to know nothing else but jesus christ the lamb of god and our sacrifice to come to god by grace alone through faith alone in his blood spilled for us chorus singing soli deo gloria to god alone be glory to god alone be glory singing soli deo gloria to god alone be glory to god alone be glory in jesus christ verse 2 we resolve to live for nothing else but jesus christ to know the one who is our life we resolve to live by nothing but your word alone your strength alone for your will alone to make our goal to please you alone worship you alone our god and our king
